response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe is a perfect match for your needs and expectations. This product holds significant value for you, just like it does for me. Considering its high quality and unique features, I would like to offer it to you for $15,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the premium value we place on customer satisfaction and loyalty. I am confident that this investment will provide you with substantial benefits and returns. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 15000}
